answers.answer: Jason,  Sounds miserable.  I know that it takes a long time to get into see a good neruologist, but other doctors don't always understand the symptoms.  Try not to read too much online to diagnose yourself.  Keep yourself comfortable and don't stress to much as it can tend to increase your symptoms.  Keep us posted.
